title: MIMA Yearbook. Vol. 3
creator_contributor_role: Modern Image Makers Association, production company
abstract: If<Then (3 min. 1985)--On sacred land 5 min. 1983)--Icon (5 min. 1986)--Animation generation (3 min. 1983)--One view (4 min. 1985)--Vision (3 min. 1985)--Love letter (6 min. 1985)--For want of (2 min. 1984)--Sinerama. Part 2: Dial 'T' for terror (3 min. 1986)--Underground (3 min. 1986)--Factory (6 min. 1984)--Short lives II (3 min. 1985)--Exacuate (5 min. 1984)
description: Volume three of a three volume set, this video compilation of excerpts of Australian film and video art covers the period from 1983-1986, and is a unique and tantalising entry into the non-mainstream history of Australian film and video.
